manifest.title: Navidrome
manifest.author: Navidrome Authors
manifest.description:
Navidrome is an open source web-based music collection server and streamer. It gives you freedom to listen
to your music collection from any browser or mobile device. It's like your personal Spotify!

## Features

* Handles very large music collections
* Streams virtually any audio format available
* Reads and uses all your beautifully curated metadata
* Great support for compilations (Various Artists albums) and box sets (multi-disc albums)
* Multi-user, each user has their own play counts, playlists, favourites, etc...
* Very low resource usage
* Multi-platform, runs on macOS, Linux and Windows. Docker images are also provided
* Ready to use binaries for all major platforms, including Raspberry Pi
* Automatically monitors your library for changes, importing new files and reloading new metadata
* Themeable, modern and responsive Web interface based on Material UI
* Compatible with all Subsonic/Madsonic/Airsonic clients
* Transcoding on the fly. Can be set per user/player. Opus encoding is supported
* Translated to various languages

register-admin.message: On first visit, set up an admin account

manifest.changelog:
* Update navidrome to 0.60.3
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/releases/tag/v0.60.3)
* [`34c6f12`](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/commit/34c6f12aeeb11144100d764b06248e0a40ccb126): feat(server): add explicit status support in smart playlists ([#​5031](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/issues/5031)) ([@​kgarner7](https://github.com/kgarner7))
* [`408aa78`](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/commit/408aa78ed53f0299d35e758cd422fd0b9dfe93a3): fix(scanner): log warning when metadata extraction fails ([@​deluan](https://github.com/deluan))
* [`ed79a88`](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/commit/ed79a8897bc16602ebadb4e3a253d87f1599642f): fix(scanner): pass filename hint to gotaglib's OpenStream for format detection ([#​5012](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/issues/5012)) ([@​deluan](https://github.com/deluan))
* [`fd09ca1`](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/commit/fd09ca103fd9fd14f5d0ecd3df6efd839a9df560): fix(scanner): resolve data race on conf.Server access in getScanner ([@​deluan](https://github.com/deluan))
* [`0a47228`](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/commit/0a4722802af833caa8dd794fa8c25f8d0a97dd06): fix(subsonic): validate JSONP callback parameter ([@​deluan](https://github.com/deluan))
* [`eb9ebc3`](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/commit/eb9ebc3fba6545334c2c13d778273c1bd55135ee): fix(ui): add missing keys in Danish translation ([#​5011](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/issues/5011)) ([@​denisarissa](https://github.com/denisarissa))
* [`62f9c3a`](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/commit/62f9c3a458bd101df1d059eeaf8bce43e7c97c21): fix: linux service should restart when upgrading ([#​5001](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/issues/5001)) ([@​mintsoft](https://github.com/mintsoft))
* [`e05a7e2`](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/commit/e05a7e230f7a72b6c2e7d789006df63b688c30e2): fix: prevent data race on conf.Server during cleanup in e2e tests ([@​deluan](https://github.com/deluan))
* [`bee0305`](https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/commit/bee0305831a76c49a46e7a6b0cbe09fd865abebc): fix: split reflex -R flags to preserve directory exclusion optimization ([@​deluan](https://github.com/deluan))
manifest.postInstallMessage:
By default, the music library is located at `/app/data/library`.

**IMPORTANT**: Passwords are stored in [clear text](https://github.com/deluan/navidrome/issues/202)
in the database for subsonic compatiblity. For this reason, we recommend using a random password.
